headline: Is Aon (AON) Using Ukraine War-Risk Reinsurance to Redefine Its Risk-Advisory Edge?
summary: Aon plc and Kniazha Vienna Insurance Group recently announced a US$25 million reinsurance facility with the U.S. International Development Finance Corporation to provide DFC-backed reinsurance on war-risk insurance portfolios of up to US$100 million, supporting coverage for small and medium-sized businesses and individuals in Ukraine. This agreement is materially significant because it aims to reduce conflict-related risk for private actors while supporting Ukraine’s broader economic...
